summary: Makes the bow draw of EVERY BOW (no really, every one) much slower. No longer are you Legolas, born of the archers and an archer your whole life
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][b]Slower Bow Draw - Not Legolas
[/b][/size][font=Arial]A little mod I made for myself, or those archery fans out there



[size=4][b]Description...[/b]
[/size][size=3]Has anyone noticed how quick the bow draw in Skyrim is? I mean, really? Like, a second maybe? While I am not an archer, I feel that this is insanely fast (although I have no idea about the realism of this change). The only mod(s) that I can find with this feature are SkyRe and PerMa, but those are complete overhaul mods, and what if I want to play without them? All this does is make the bow draw on every single bow the same, and much much slower. Here's a video (don't mind the ENB notification, I loaded up vanilla and since I use MO it didn't apply my ini changes):
[youtube]yPQFHkeWWJU[/youtube]

[/size][size=4][b]Future plans...
[/b][/size][size=3]- Change draw speed based on weight/poundage of the bow (of course no concrete way to tell, just telling by looks)[/size]
[size=3]- Lower draw speed if you are a wood elf (though I have NO idea of how to do this)[/size]
[/font]
